summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview summary from April 10, 2020, with a female victim (name redacted). She alleges that Leon Black manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened her, and that he was connected to Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and Prince Andrew. She also claims Black ran a sex trafficking ring, forced her to sign an NDA, and transferred $10 million to Epstein.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Allegedly manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened the interviewee; promised her drugs and to help her stay in the country; claimed to be friends with police, Epstein, and Harvey Weinstein; allegedly ran a sex trafficking ring.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Leon Black flew the interviewee to Epstein's Florida home; Epstein allegedly wanted to have sex with her and was described as having a sex addiction.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The interviewee was introduced to her by Leon Black.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The interviewee was introduced to him by Leon Black.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: Leon Black told the interviewee he was friends with him.

connections.description: Black allegedly transferred ten million dollars to Epstein around 2015 and flew the victim to Epstein's Florida home.
Black introduced the interviewee to Ghislaine Maxwell.
Black introduced the interviewee to Prince Andrew.
Black told the interviewee he was friends with Harvey Weinstein.
Black took the victim to Epstein's home where Epstein allegedly pressured her for sex, with Black making threats.
Black allegedly manipulated, sexually abused, threatened, and raped the interviewee over several years.

events.title: Victim meets Leon Black
events.description: The interviewee, who was modeling, met Leon Black.

events.title: Alleged rape by Leon Black
events.description: Leon Black allegedly forced his way into the victim's apartment and raped her.

events.title: Signing of Non-Disclosure Agreement
events.description: The victim signed a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black.

events.title: $10 Million Transfer to Epstein
events.description: Leon Black transferred ten million dollars to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim was interviewed telephonically by the FBI regarding her allegations against Leon Black.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: A victim alleges Leon Black manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened her over years, including an alleged rape in 2014.
Leon Black allegedly flew the victim to Jeffrey Epstein's Florida home, where Epstein pressured her for sex.
Leon Black allegedly told the victim he ran a sex trafficking ring and had worked for the FBI.
The victim signed a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black in 2015, around the time he allegedly transferred $10 million to Jeffrey Epstein.
The victim was introduced by Black to Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew, among others.
